ALTER TABLE table_name\nADD COLUMN column_name VARCHAR(255);
SELECT a.*, b.*\nFROM table_a a\nLEFT JOIN table_b b ON a.id = b.table_a_id;
SELECT a.*, b.*\nFROM table_a a\nRIGHT JOIN table_b b ON a.id = b.table_a_id;
SELECT a.*, b.*\nFROM table_a a\nINNER JOIN table_b b ON a.id = b.table_a_id;
SELECT a.*, b.*\nFROM table_a a\nFULL OUTER JOIN table_b b ON a.id = b.table_a_id;
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table1\nUNION\nSELECT column1, column2 FROM table2;
SELECT * FROM table_name\nWHERE column_name IN (value1, value2, value3);

SELECT column_name,
    CASE
        WHEN condition1 THEN result1
        WHEN condition2 THEN result2
        ELSE default_result
    END AS alias
FROM table_name;

SELECT column1, COUNT(*)
FROM table_name
GROUP BY column1
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM table_name\nORDER BY column1 ASC, column2 DESC;

CREATE VIEW view_name AS
SELECT column1, column2
FROM table_name
WHERE condition;

AFTER INSERT ON table_name
FOR EACH ROW

    -- trigger logic
